summary: TAKATA AIRBAG INFLATORS  I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE DATED 2/22/2017 FOR PASSENGER AIRBAG INFLATOR REPLACEMENT. I CONTACTED MY DEALER, RACEWAY FORD IN RIVERSIDE, CA AND WAS TOLD I WOULD BE CONTACTED WHEN PARTS WERE AVAILABLE. I RECEIVED ANOTHER LETTER MARCH 2017 FROM FORD SAYING I WOULD BE CONTACTED BY FORD WHEN PARTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR THIS RECALL. I CONTINUE TO CHECK WITH MY DEALERSHIP AND AS OF 1/10/2018 THEY STILL SAID NO REPLACEMENT WAS AVAILABLE. IT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE THAT I HAVE NOT HAD THE RECALL FIXED OR AT LEAST BE GIVEN A TIME FRAME THAT IT WOULD BE RESOLVED. I HAVE HAD NO FURTHER LETTERS FROM FORD AND IT HAS BEEN ALMOST A YEAR DRIVING A RECALLED VEHICLE!
